extendedInfo.description: Play Draw Time the only drawing, guessing, and judging game created! FREE $5,000 Draw Time money with download. If you enjoyed Draw Something, then this game will blow you away!Draw Time is the newest twist on drawing games. Start playing now and be one of the first to EVER play. You will have lifetime of bragging rights to your friends when it reaches millions and millions of downloads! Play turn-based with Facebook friends, random Facebook friends, and random opponents. This isn't your normal drawing game where you play together. In Draw Time you are competing for some serious Draw Time cash! Oh, and don't forget about the trophies you can win, and Bubble Bursts, and Time you can get. Plus worldwide, country (United States, UK, India etc...), friends, and leader board rankings!Guess the word being drawn as you watch TWO different recorded drawings of the same word at the same time.Judge your friends drawings, beat the clock, wager up to $100 Draw Time money each round, and up to $200 in the final round. Features in Draw Time Free:* Play with Facebook friends, random Facebook friends, and random opponents. * FREE $5,000 Draw Time money* FREE colors for drawing* FREE 5 Bubble Burst* FREE 75 seconds of Time* 10 Categories* Over 1,000 words to draw and guess* Play over 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi* Brag by sharing your scores, trophies, and rankings with Facebook friends* Wager Draw Time money* And MORE!           *** Check out the screenshots below***Search Keywords: draw, drawing, guess, guessing, words, word, games, screen, colors, coloring, bubble bursts, time, coins, money, turn-based, turn based, categories, judging

reviews.title: What\'s wrong with this darn game!?!?
reviews.comment: I select random player and nothing ever happens. It says searching for about 3 seconds and then nothing!!?? Why would anyone buy a game that they can\'t even play??!!?? I have a Galaxy SII. What the F? I\'m going on yeah 4 stars now simply for potential. It\'s now been 24 hours since I installed and 9 hours ago I was told this would BE fixed in a few hours???
